Name: Roosevelt Cocktail
Ingredients: 52.5 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Hit the right proportions with freshly squeezed orange juice, and this drink is sublime.
Nutrition: One serving of Roosevelt Cocktail contains 195 calories
